alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Broome, west central Delaware and southern Chenango Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sanitaria Springs, or 11 miles northeast of Binghamton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Sanford, Bainbridge, Masonville, Afton, Harpursville, Sanitaria Springs, Nineveh, Stilesville and Belden. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 4 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
